text: Tavares Bastos is the surname of a political family during the Empire of Brazil. It can refer to: * Aureliano Cândido Tavares Bastos (1839-1875), Brazilian politician, writer and journalist ** Tavares Bastos (favela), a favela (slum) in Rio de Janeiro, named after the politician ** Rua Tavares Bastos, the main road to the Tavares Bastos favela * (1813-1893), Brazilian politician, and father of Aureliano Cândido Tavares Bastos * , Brazilian politician: brother of Aureliano Cândido Tavares Bastos, and son of José Tavares Bastos
title: Tavares Bastos
